Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Prohibits elected officials from collecting retirement while still in office when the retirement is earned from an elective public office
Summary: Prohibits elected officials from collecting retirement while still in office when the retirement is earned from an elective public office.
LawCode: Amd ยง150, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to prohibiting elected officials from collecting retirement while still in an elected position
